front.title: Generic Method for Transmitting Reliable SCTP Control Chunks

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the Stream ControlTransmission Protocol (SCTP) [RFC2960] to provide a generic method for transmitting a reliable control chunk. This provides a frameworkwhereby future applications which require a specific SCTP controlchunk(s) to be sent reliably can use this extension to provide therequired functionality.
